title: Watch Lady Gaga Fall Off Stage and Crash onto the Floor After Being Freakin' Dropped by a Fan
text:
Watch Lady Gaga Fall Off Stage and Crash onto the Floor After Being Freakin' Dropped by a Fan

View photos Photo credit: Twitter More

From Cosmopolitan

Lady Gaga was dropped by a fan during her Las Vegas Residency show on Thursday night.

Gaga had let the fan pick her up, and he ended up crashing into the audience and onto the floor.

You know how Lady Gaga sometimes lets lucky fans on stage with her? Yeah, well that backfired. As Entertainment Tonight reports, Mother Monster invited one of her fans to join her in the spotlight during Thursday night's Las Vegas Residency show, and he ended up casually picking her up. Which is a bold move, but Gaga seemed fine with it, even wrapping her legs around his waist.

The problem? Our dude started jumping around, and then fully fell off stage, taking Gaga with him. In videos from fans in the crowd, you can see Gaga and this guy fall over from literally every angle and crash then straight into the audience and onto the floor.

Naturally everyone was fully shook by the moment, though not too shook to capture it on camera. Ya know. Priorities.

why did the spotlight follow them i'm crying 😭 pic.twitter.com/4cuxovvkHr — Lady Gaga Facts (@LGMonsterFacts) October 18, 2019

Here's an even closer view of Gaga saying "I'm okay, I'm okay," which turns out she was because she continued with the show right after (though fan accounts claim a medical team was standing by backstage to double check).

Lady Gaga had an unfortunate fall off the stage tonight at Enigma after a fan picked her up and tripped.



Gaga crashed down first with the fan falling on top of her. She got right back up and continued the show. We hope both her and the fan are okay.

pic.twitter.com/Vx812nSUwE





— Gaga Media ⭐️ (@GagaMediaDotNet) October 18, 2019

And if you're wondering about the poor guy who dropped Gaga, according to fans he started crying and she brought him back on stage / asked everyone on the internet to be nice to him. My hearrrrrrrtttttt.

Imagine after this fall, you stand up and go to the stage and immediately defend this kid and then you sing with him. Only lady gaga can do this, she is real hero, I am so proud. For the whole morning I feel so sad because this happened, I just hope she is ok. pic.twitter.com/NO8iqxO4ky — Child Of Lady Gaga (@BloodyJudasGaga) October 18, 2019

There's a cute video of that too:

Lady gaga brought back the fan on stage after their fall “Everything is okay, everything is okay... We are like Jack and Rose in the Titanic” pic.twitter.com/hpA3MFuHlI — Gaga Now 👾 (@ladygaganownet) October 18, 2019

In conclusion, Gaga is the actual best, now excuse me while I go watch every single angle of this video.
